products.name: Hydracream Fusion
products.description: Introducing our balancing and anti-pollution facial cream-oil. This unique formula offers nourishment and hydration to the skin while effectively cleansing and protecting against pollution, leaving your skin beautifully smooth and refreshed.

products.name: Bi-phase Eye Make-up Remover
products.description: To daily cleanses all types of eye and lip make-up (even waterproof) , without leaving a greasy residue. Suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.

products.name: Vitality Cleansing Milk Normal Combination Skin
Vitality Lotion OR Cleansernormal Combination Skin 400ml
Redensifying Youth Cream
products.description: To restore a radiant complexion that is full of vitality while reducing the visible signs of ageing. Revitalised, the skin appears redensified. This cream supports thin or fragile skins showing signs of a loss of density and volume. Focus is on supporting the dermal redensifying of fine textured mature skin.

products.name: Mesoprotech Hydra Cream
products.description: Facial sunscreen designed specifically for dry and dehydrated skin, offering SPF50+ very high photoprotection. Formulated with ceramides to reinforce the skin barrier, restoring comfort and softness. Dermatologically tested and water-resistant. Ideal for enhancing skin elasticity and hydration.

products.name: Age Element Anti Wrinkle Eye Contour
Soopaskin Rescue Mist DAILY
products.description: Introducing Soopa Skin HOCl Rescue Mist Daily, a fine spray-mist featuring HOCl (Hypochlorous Acid) to preserve the skin's micro-biome and provide soothing, purifying, and rejuvenating benefits for fragile, irritated, and environmentally stressed skin. This gentle yet effective mist offers relief from discomfort while promoting overall skin health. Soopa Skin HOCl Rescue Mist Daily works to soothe irritation, purify the skin, and restore its vitality, leaving you with a refreshed and revitalized complexion.

products.name: BIOGEN C
products.description: Biogen C is a “beauty in a flash” cream designed to pick up tired and stressed skin. Biogen C aims to stimulate, tone, and tighten dull stressed skin. Improves tissue oxygenation and strengthens weakened capillaries. It also helps smooth the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. 50ml

products.name: CALERASE
products.description: A hand and foot cream designed for callused, dry, and cracked skin. Calerase cream maintains smooth skin on the feet between MediPedi® treatments. Its strong desquamating properties minimize dry and dead skin, can be used on the feet and hands as a cuticle cream. 60ml

products.name: DMK EFA+
products.description: The DMK efa+ supplements are a powerful group of essential fatty acids 3,6,7 and 9, derived from evening primrose and sea buckthorn oils. DMK efa’s are required for the structure of all membranes in the body. DMK efa’s “waterproof” the skin, maintaining the barrier of the skin impermeable. The skin’s primary function is to protect internal organs and skeleton from the exterior attack. DMK efa+ only uses the purest raw materials that are compounded in the USA with our FDA registered lab. DMK efa+ is designed for a wide variety of skin conditions to repair the cell membranes and help to rebuild stronger, healthier, and better functioning skin. DMK efa+ is formulated to aid in the improvement of barrier function and transepidermal water loss. It is particularly useful for acne, inflamed or reactive skin, pigmentation, fine lines, wrinkles, and aging complexions. It is also recommended for clients undergoing professional skin revision treatments. Consult your doctor before using DMK efa+ if you are pregnant or nursing. This essential fatty acid supplement should not replace a balanced diet. Use this product only as directed. 120 capsules
